ygData.subject: Re: Un-Broken Song
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/3/99 1:43:44 PM Pacific Standard Time, pr0teus@earthlink.net writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/3/99 1:43:44 PM Pacific Standard Time,
pr0teus@... writes:

<< So don't be a jerk and say
stuff like "oh we should all be banned!" >>
I assume you are speaking to me even though you fail to quote a single
line....If you read that perhaps a lil more slowly it is quite apparent I was
being sarcastic. It was in response to you saying you wish bards would quit
using selo's to break root as it is an exploit.
Some people like to use /sarcasm off or whatever, I refuse to. If you cannot
comprehend that I'm being sarcastic by the words I use (seriously, who uses
"Oh my!"?) then that is a failure in your department and not mine.

Renaldo Rallentando
